ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I doubt there will be many places to solo in the new expansion.  They ve made it quite clear with the changes they ve made over the past year that they
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Kent King" <propellerheadus@...>
>
> I pre-ordered, because they mention that characters
> "get a choice"... I'm assuming that means a choice
> about solo vs grouping :)
>
> Does anyone know whether I'll be able to solo in the
> new expansion? (assuming that I'm good at solo of
> course, which I am).

I doubt there will be many places to solo in the new expansion. They've
made it quite clear with the changes they've made over the past year that
they consider this a "grouping game", so I doubt they'll make an expansion
that would make soloing easier.

Hunter Sulamwen
Forest Stalker of <Fate's Forge>
E'ci
